headings.usage: Page titles, Section headers, Modal titles

body.usage: General UI text, descriptions, form labels

data.usage: Data tables, Field mapping inputs, JSON snippets, IDs

rules: Overlines/Labels must be Uppercase + Tiny + Wide Spacing (tracking-[0.2em])
Line height: Tight for headers, Relaxed for body

primary.description: Deep Obsidian / Midnight Blue for Authority

accent.description: International Klein Blue / Electric Blue for Action

spacing_system.rule: Use 2-3x more spacing than typical designs. Containers with borders must have internal padding (p-6 or p-8).

grid_system.dashboard: MODE B: High Density Grid (grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 lg:grid-cols-4, gap-4 or gap-6)
grid_system.marketing: MODE A: The Tetris Grid (grid-cols-12, gap-8 to gap-12)

containers.card_style: Flat background, 1px subtle border (border-border), no shadow by default. Hover: Slight lift (-translate-y-1), subtle shadow (shadow-lg).
containers.glassmorphism: Use for sticky headers/overlays. bg-white/70 backdrop-blur-xl border-b border-white/20.

rules: Structure & Layouts: Pure HTML + Tailwind CSS (div, section, span)
Forms: Shadcn Form, Input, Select, Checkbox

customization.buttons: Sharp edges or small radius (rounded-md). No pill shapes for this professional context.
customization.inputs: High contrast borders. Focus ring must be distinct.
customization.tables: Dense, minimal borders. Zebra striping optional but preferred for wide datasets.

dashboard.layout: Inverted Pyramid. Summary cards at top (Key Metrics), Detailed 'Recent Uploads' or 'Conflicts' table below.
dashboard.features: High density, scanability. Use 'Grid Borders' style for metrics.

upload_center.layout: Centered dropzone, clear instructions. Progress indicators.
upload_center.visuals: Use 'Abstract 3D' image as subtle background or side panel.

field_mapping.layout: Dual Window Pattern. Source fields on left, Target fields on right. Connecting lines or clear mapping inputs.

conflict_resolution.layout: Split screen. Conflicting data side-by-side. Clear 'Accept/Reject' actions.

login_background.description: Abstract white wavy surface with grid pattern. Use for Login/Auth pages.

empty_state.description: Abstract wavy lines pattern in grayscale. Use for empty states or placeholders.

universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
